Title: Nodijon
Writer: Sheikh Zahirul Haque (story), Shahneoyaj Cacoly (dialogue), Shahneoyaj Cacoly (screenplay)
Actors: Mamunur Rashid, Pran Roy, Shormy Mala, Toma Mirza
Plot: The lifestyle of people living in the river banks strive to struggle and fight everyday against natural and man-made adversities.
